definitions.definition: Nearly ; not clearly on one side or the other of a border or boundary , ambiguous .
examples: I would rather hire a talented layman than a university graduate with borderline qualifications.

definitions.definition: Of questionable taste or acceptability ; approaching bad taste.
examples: Your borderline remarks about my aunt’s dress destroyed my evening.

main_definition: Nearly ; not clearly on one side or the other of a border or boundary , ambiguous .
secondary_definitions: Of questionable taste or acceptability ; approaching bad taste.
